Malva pudding bụ iwepụta uto na-atọ ụtọ nke sitere na South Africa
O nwere jam apricot ma nwee spongy caramelised tescho
A na-awụsakarị ofe na-acha nzu nzu n'elu ya mgbe ọ na-ekpo ọkụ, a na-ejikarị ya na cusitard na / ma ọ bụ ice-cream
Ọtụtụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ South Afrika na-enye ya
A na-eche na pudding ahụ bụ nke Dutch mgbe  Cape Dutch sitere na Cape.

Pudding ahụ bụ nke amara nke Ọma na West Coast nke US mgbe onye isi nri nke Oprah Winfrey, Art Smith, nyere ya maka nri abalị Krismas na afọ puku abụọ na isi (2006) nye ụmụ akwụkwọ nke OprahWinfrey Leadership Academy for Girls na South Africa.
E nwere echiche dị iche iche banyere mmalite nke aha ahụ.
Jan Ellis Pudding bụ ụdị dị iche.
